headline: Two Player Wordle
description:
On the Wordle bandwagon...

I've created a two player Wordle - called Word Fight (https://www.wordfight.me). Where you play others to guess the five letter word in less turns.

As one of the many Wordle obsessed, I play it daily with my partner. While we had our morning coffee a few months ago, competing with each other to see who could guess it in the least number of turns, I came up with this idea to make Wordle a two player game.

With a chess elo rating system, global ranking, and leaderboard - the Word Fight game helps us to answer the question: who's better at Wordle?

I'd love feedback from the community, what works with the game, what doesn't. All feedback welcome at contact@wordfight.me

Thanks!
description_zh-Hans:
在Wordle的浪潮中......

我已经创建了一个双人Wordle--叫做Word Fight（https://www.wordfight.me）。

作为众多Wordle痴迷者之一，我每天都和我的伙伴玩这个游戏。几个月前，当我们早上喝咖啡时，我们互相竞争，看谁能用最少的回合数猜出它，我想出了这个主意，让Wordle成为一个双人游戏。

通过国际象棋elo评级系统、全球排名和排行榜--Word Fight游戏帮助我们回答这个问题：谁更擅长Wordle？

我希望得到社区的反馈，游戏中哪些地方可行，哪些不可行。 欢迎所有反馈，contact@wordfight.me

谢谢!
